banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: A rallying cry for office shorts
videoData.socialTitle: A rallying cry for office shorts

nodes.whoTheyAre: Self-proclaimed knee activist Chris Vogtherr has begun the new manvolution -- the "Free the Knee" campaign. As a senior relationship manager for SSGA, he seeks to revolutinize the male office attire.

videoData.description: It's time for men to "Free the Knee" at work. In the scorching days of summer women can wear professional skirts but men are impractically confined to long trousers all year round. By spreading a "Free the Knee" campaign, Chris Vogtherr challenges the notion that shorts are unprofessional.
videoData.socialDescription: It's time for men to "Free the Knee" at work. In the scorching days of summer women can wear professional skirts but men are impractically confined to long trousers all year round. By spreading a "Free the Knee" campaign, Chris Vogtherr challenges the notion that shorts are unprofessional.
